choices: A Different Part of her Home
1.content:
Arryn Zech was relaxing on her couch late at night watching a movie titled The Incredible Shrinking Man. She wore a white bra, a pair of dark blue lounge pants, and was completely barefoot. As the movie dragged on though Arryn started having trouble staying awake due to how late it was, and as she drifted off to sleep she thought about how terrifying it would actually to suddenly shrink to such atiny size like in the movie.

That night as she slept, Arryn had a nightmare in which she was only an inch in height. Throughout the dream she found herself being chased by huge animals that all wanted to eat her tiny self. Eventually, one of the animals manged to catch and swallow her, but just before she entered the stomach Arryn woke up panting. She calmed herself down relieved that it was only a dream before she noticed that something was not right.

Arryn's panic renewed when she realized that part of her dream had come true and that she was now only one inch tall. Somehow, while she slept she had shrunk like in her dream, the outfit she wore when she fell asleep thankfully having shrunk with her.

"This is bad," Arryn muttered to herself as she nervously paced back and forth. "I'm now bite sized just like in my dream. I need to find a way to get to my normal size before I get crushed or eaten."

Arryn then stopped pacing and finally took a good look at her surroundings and found that she no longer in her living room. Her location was now...
1.title: Teeny Tiny Arryn Zech

11.content: Where in her home did Arryn Zech wind up?
11.title: Where Exactly?

choices: Her Other Dog, Watson, Came In
111.content:
Arryn blinked in astonishment as she turned her head to look at her now massive kitchen.

"Well at least I'm not in too much danger," Arryn said to herself. After all she was in her home and when it came to animals at least she didn't have to worry. Her puppies wouldn't eat her after all, would they? Then Arryn noticed an odd moist sensation all over her body.

"WHAT THE?!" Arryn cried out in surprise as she looked down. She found herself submerged up to her neck in an open package of cocktail wieners on the floor. Being shrunk to an inch in height was one thing but how did she end up in a package of cocktail wieners?!

"This feels so weird," Arryn moaned as she dug herself out of the package and onto the kitchen floor. She took a moment to let herself drip dry. She still had the scent of the wiener's all over her though. The scent of food. Arryn decided it might be a good idea to look for help in the rest of the house when...
111.title: The Cocktail Wiener Incident

choices: Stay Put, Watson Won't Eat Her Right?
1112.content:
Arryn paused and felt her breathe catch in her throat at the sight before her. Her puppy, a dog named Watson, entered the kitchen. It was then that Arryn truly comprehended how tiny she was. Her adorable pup might as well be a kaiju compared to her. The kitchen floor seemed to grow cold beneath Arryn's barefeet as she watched Watson sniff the air. Was he looking for her or something to eat?

She gulped when Watson turned his head in the direction of her and the package of cocktail wieners. Arryn did not like the look on his face, and she liked it even less when he licked his lips as though he were about to have a tasty treat. Then Watson started to walk towards her. Was Arryn's dog going to eat her? Surely he wouldn't, would he? As Watson approached the RWBY star wondered if she should make a run for it. But then again maybe Watson was just coming to eat the cocktail wieners and not her. Arryn needed to decided what she was going to do quickly.
1112.title: Watson Arrives

11121.content: Arryn chose to stay put, as her now gigantic puppy approached. As Watson came closer she wondered if she had made a mistake. Unfortunately, she ran out of time to change her mind as soon Watson was before her and looking at both her and the package of the cocktail wieners. Now the question was which was Watson going to eat?
11121.title: Staying Put

111211.content:
Arryn was confident at first that Watson wouldn't eat her, but now she had her doubts as he bent down to sniff her. The lovely lady found herself nearly being sucked up his nose. Then Watson opened his mouth and let his pink tongue roll out. The slimy muscle slid over Arryn as he licked her. Arryn, now covered in dog drool, desperately hoped that Watson was just being friendly.

Unfortunately, for her he wasn't. Watson hadn't recognized Arryn when he saw her. She was far to small to be his mistress, and when he sniffed her he noticed that she smelled more like food. While the taste test had told him the bug before him tasted similiar to his owner it also told him that she was tasty. That was all the convincing he needed that this tiny creature before him was food instead of his mistress. With that Watson licked his lips and brought his tongue back out to his tasty treat.

Arryn's eyes widened as Watson's tongue slid beneath her feet, forcing her to fall forward on the powerful muscle. She could only watch in horror as she was pulled into his hungry maw. Before Arryn could recover from the shock that her own dog would eat her, Watson snapped his jaws closed, thus trapping her inside.

"Watson!" Arryn cried out as she lay on her dog's tongue, "Please, don't eat mommy!"

However, Watson either didn't hear her, understand her, or care as the tongue began tasting her in earnest. Arryn was rolled around on the tongue and licked against the pallet. It seemed Watson enjoyed how she tasted quite a bit, as the saliva in Watson's mouth increased quite a bit. It did not take long for Arryn to become covered from head to toe in it. She even had to spit some out of her mouth at one point. After about ten minutes of tasting the tongue settled down and began pushing Arryn towards the back of the throat.

"NOOO!" Arryn screamed as she felt Watson tilt his head back and with a loud 'GULP' swallowed her whole and alive.

"I can't believe Watson ate me," Arryn said, tears streaming down her face, as muscles rippled all around her, massaging her slowly down to the stomach. As the gurgles of the belly grew closer a mixture of saliva and mucus clung to her from head to toe. Before long the lovely ladies journey came to an end when she reached a wall of flesh that was none other than the stomach sphincter. Recognizing Watson's former mistress as food it quickly squeezed her into the stomach where she ended up splashing around in digestive juices. As Arryn floated in the digestive enzymes, she felt her skin begin to tingle. Arryn's eyes widened when mush that was once cocktail wieners started raining down on her. Apparently, eating his owner wasn't enough to satisfy Watson's hunger and he decided to have the wieners for desert. Arryn tried to swim out of the way of the incoming debris, but there was just too much. Eventually, some of the mush eventually landed on the former voice actress and trapped her beneath the surface. She struggle to break free, but it was no use as she too weak to get the mush off her. Eventually, Arryn had to gasp for air, thus allowing the digestive juices to enter her insides. The Last thing Arryn remembered was the tingling sensation entering her, followed by the sensation of drowning.

Outside, Watson finished the cocktail wieners and made his way to the living room. Once there he jumped up on the coach and curled up to sleep. In his mind he wondered when Arryn Zech was going come and feed him, not realizing she already had.
111211.title: Arryn Zech Feeds Her Dog

111212.content:
Watson opened his maw wide as he leaned his head down to enjoy his tasty treat. Arryn turned her head and squeezed her eyes shut as she prepared to be eaten. However, the saliva and teeth never came. Hesitantly, Arryn opened her eyes and saw Watson was chowing down on the cocktail wieners. She breathed a sigh of relief and fell onto her ass.

"I knew Watson wouldn't eat me," Arryn said. She closed her eyes and allowed herself to relax for a moment. When Arryn opened her eyes again she saw Watson staring down at her in a curious way. What was Watson thinking?
111212.title: Wieners For Dinner

11122.content:
Arryn was only an inch tall and smelled like food. The odds of Watson recognizing her were small. Even if he did recognize her at her new stature it is most likely Watson's instincts would override her status as pet owner and he'd eat her any way. However, the door to the back yard as not more than five feet behind the tiny voice actress (well five feet at her normal size). If She could squeeze under it she'd be able to get away. So with all that in mind Arryn turned on her heel and bolted for the back door.

If Watson was intending to eat her or not was now irrelevant. The moment Arryn started running she became nothing more than food.If he caught her, even if he recognized her as his former owner he would still eat her. Licking his lips Watson began to give chase. Arryn turned her head to look back for just a moment and regretted it. While she was half way to the door Watson was almost atop her. The former RWBY star picked up the pace as she tried desperately to avoid becoming her dog's lunch. As Arryn got closer to the door she could practically feel Watson's breathe on her back. She was almost there and Watson was reaching for her with a wide open maw. With a grunt Arryn dived towards the door. Does she make it, or does Watson get a tasty snack?
11122.title: The Chase

111221.content:
Arryn landed on her belly halfway under the crack between the door and floor. Not taking a moment to rest she quickly began crawling on her belly beneath the door. Seeing his prey about to escape Watson redoubled his efforts and lunged at his former mistress's legs. His jaws snapped closed just barely missing her barefeet as they disappeared beneath the door. A shiver ran down Arryn's spine as she felt the resulting gust of air from the closing jaws on her feet. She could hear her dog's growls and barks of frustation as she crawled to freedom. In less then a minute the RWBY star emerged on the other side. However, she didn't stop to celebrate as she could hear Watson scratching at the door on the other side, still wanting to catch her. So the young woman continued to run. She ran across her once small patio and into the jungle of grass that was her back yard.

After Arryn was a few feet into the cover of the grass she slowed to a stop and sat down on a leaf to catch her breath. Once her breathing returned to normal she looked around at the grass that toward over her like the tallest of trees, and the reality of her new situation hit her. Arryn was tiny. She was now at the bottom of the food chain. By going outside she was not at risk from multiple predators rather than the one or two she had kept as pets.

"Maybe I should have just let Watson eat me," Arryn moaned. Still she had already prolonged her possibly inevitable consumption, and if she were to go back into the house now she would surely be eaten. Arryn might as well at least continue trying to survive and explore the outside world. So with a sigh she got back onto her feet to begin her exploration when...
111221.title: Welcome to the Backyard

1112211.content: Before Arryn took a single step she found herself once again frozen in fear. Before her the grass was rustling as something approached. Judging from the movement of the grass the voice actress could tell that whatever was coming was bigger than her. Before she could try to make a break for it Arryn found herself before a...
1112211.title: A New Threat Emerges

11122111.content: Arryn gulped as a stray black cat emerged from the grass. The feline looked down at the young woman with what could only be described as hunger in its eyes. It leaned its head down and took a few quick whiffs of Arryn as it sniffed her to see if she smelled as tasty as she looked. Then it brought its head back up and licked its lips. Arryn didn't need anymore convincing that she was about to become cat food. She screamed and turned around to run. However unlike with Watson the former RWBY star only made it a few steps before the cat pinned her down with its paw. Looking up in terror Arryn saw the felines open maw descending towards her. She squeaked and squeezed her eyes shut as prepared to be eaten.
11122111.title: Cat Girl Turned Cat Food

111221112.content:
Arryn expected to feel the cat's teeth tearing into her, but instead she felt the paw lift off her and a tug on her bra. Snapping her eyes open Arryn found the cat grasping the back of her bra in its mouth. Then the cat lifted her up into the air, and and dropped her to the ground. The air was forced from Arryn's lungs as she landed on the ground with an 'oof'. Shakily she got back onto her feet only for the cat to start batting her around with its paws. After a few minutes of this the disoriented voice actress found herself pinned yet again under the cat's paw. Then the feline began to roll her around on the ground for a few minutes.

'Why isn't it eating me?" Arryn wondered as it lifted her into the air via her bra again. Then the cat once again dropped her and began batting her around before she could recover. However, when the cat once again pinned her under its paw a chill ran down her spin as Arryn realized what was going on. 'Cats tend to play with their food before eating it,' Arryn thought in horror as it once again began rolling her around again. This meant that she had a slim chance to escape being eaten though. As the Cat lifted Arryn into the air a third time, the former voice actress braced herself for hitting the ground again. Hopefully, that would allow her to recover quickly enough to make a run for it before she found herself being batted around again. The cat then...
111221112.title: The Cat Plays With Its Food

1112211121.content:
To Arryn's shock and horror the cat didn't drop her, but instead tossed her high into the air. At the pinnacle the former voice actress looked down to see the cat's maw wide open beneath her. It was done playing with its food and was going to eat her now. As Arryn began to fall towards the hungry maw she screamed in terror. She flailed her limbs wildly in a desperate attempt to alter her course, but her fate was inevitable. With a splat the former RWBY star landed in the feline's mouth.

Arryn quickly sat up on the cat's tongue . Her eyes grew wide as she watched the mouth close sealing her in darkness. That was the last time the poor girl would ever see the outside world. Arryn soon found herself flat on her back again as the tongue licked her against the palette and rolled her around. Saliva clung to the tiny woman as the cat tried to determine just how she tasted. Evidently, Arryn was pretty tasty as the cat started purring while it continued to taste her. While the cat might have been enjoying this, its prey found the experience excruciating. The tongue was like sandpaper as it licked her all over, and it would not be long before it started tear her skin. Realizing there was only one way out Arryn crawled towards the throat behind her. As soon as her head and shoulders entered the throat a reflex was triggered, and with a loud 'GULP' Arryn felt herself get swallowed whole and alive.

As the muscles in the esophagus rippled all around her Arryn's eyes grew wide as she suddenly realized what she had done. She had traded a slow and painful demise by tasting for a slow and painful demise via digestion. 'There was no other choice," Arryn thought trying to comfort herself as a mixture of saliva and mucus began to cover her from head to toe. So with that she just let the muscles massage her down to the waiting stomach. Before long her head came into contact with the stomach sphincter. Recognizing the former internet star as food it quickly squeezed her into the stomach where she landed with a splash. Inside the fleshy chamber Arryn Zech found herself floating in digestive juices, and her skin tingled where they made contact with her bare flesh.

"What did I do to deserve this?" Arryn asked woefully as a single tear streamed down her face. Thankfully she passed out from a lack of air before she feel the full agony of being digested.
1112211121.title: Tossed and Eaten

1112211122.content: Arryn landed on her hands and knees and quickly sprang up onto her feet. She then ran as fast as her tiny legs would carry her in the opposite direction. The cat let out an angry hiss and gave chase. As Arryn ran she could hear the cat quickly gaining on her. It was determined to devour the voice actress and she knewthat if something didn't change soon she would find herself in the feline's stomach. Then Arryn saw it. An empty beer bottle that had somehow found its way into her back yard. If she could get inside it she might be safe from the ravenous feline. So Arryn ran towards the bottle, but the cat was gaining on her quickly. When she was about ten feet from the bottle the young voice actress risked a look behind her, and regretted it. The cat was almost upon her! Ready to have her fill its belly it opened its mouth and lunged at her. In desperation Arryn leaped towards the opening of the bottle and desperately prayed she would make it to safety. Did she make it?
1112211122.title: Cat and Mouse

11122111221.content:
Arryn squeezed her eyes shut and prayed she was about to land in the bottle and not the cat's mouth. Then with a thud and the sensation of rushing air on her barefeet Arryn felt glass beneath her. The former RWBY star's eyes snapped open and she saw that she had made it into the neck of the bottle. However she couldn't celebrate just yet as a quick glance back revealed the cat's tongue coming to try and get her out. Arryn screamed and began crawling further in just before the tongue could get her. She made her way into the main body of the bottle and landed in a small puddle of beer that was still inside the bottle. Now she smelled of beer as well as cocktail wiener's, but at least now she was relatively safe.

However, the cat wasn't ready to give up just yet. Determined to eat the young voice actress inside the cat batted at the bottle and rolled it around in order to try and get Arryn out. Did it succeed?
11122111221.title: Into the Bottle

111221112212.content: Why does the cat leave?
111221112212.title: No It Leaves

choices: There was a tapping on the glass
Something smelled like it was cooking
There was a slimy sensation on her legs
1112211122121.content:
Arryn was tossed and tumbled about as the cat swatted and rolled the bottle about in order to get her out and eat her. Twice Arryn nearly being thrown back into the neck of the bottle, but luck was on the young voice actress's side as she managed to scramble away just before the next swat. After about ten minutes it stopped. On her hands and knees Arryn looked up through the glass of the bottle only to see the cat hiss and leave. Evidently it decide Arryn wasn't worth the effort.

Arryn breathed a sigh of relief before getting up and walking over to the back of the bottle. Once there Arryn sat down with her back against the glass and her legs stretched out before her. The lovely lady let out a yawn as she realized just how exhausted she was. Nearly being eaten first by her dog and then a random cat had taken a lot out of Arryn. As she felt her eyelids grow heavy Arryn didn't even attempt to fight off sleep. After all she was relatively safe in the bottle; so what could hurt to rest for a while? So with that Arryn drifted off to sleep. When she awoke...
1112211122121.title: A Moment To Rest

11122111221211.content: As Arryn slept an annoying tapping began to enter her dreams. She tried to ignore it at first, but eventually it caused the tiny voice actress to wake up some what annoyed. Any drowsiness Arryn had left was quickly dispersed as she realized she could still hear the tapping, and it coming from the glass wall to her left. Looking over Arryn realized the tapping was being caused by...
11122111221211.title: The Tapping

111221112212112.content: Was it someone Arryn knew?
111221112212112.title: Another Shrunken Person

11122111221214.content:
About an hour into her cat nap Arryn felt her sleeping bag was a little tight around her legs and there seemed to be something slimy in it. 'Wait, I didn't fall asleep in a sleeping bag,' Arryn remembered. Her eyes snapped open and she screamed. Wrapped around Arryn's legs just above her knees was the maw of hungry snake and the slight bulge in its neck was unmistakably what it had already swallowed of the former RWBY star. While Arryn had been sleeping the snake had come into the bottle looking for a home and found a free meal.

"NO!" Arryn cried out as with a 'gulp' the snake swallowed more of her.

Desperately, Arryn tried to pry the snakes maw open with her bare hands, but it was futile. All the young voice actress accomplished was having her hands slip into the maw as with another 'gulp' the snake swallowed her up to her waist. With her arms now effectively pinned all Arryn could do was squirm and watch herself be slowly be consumed. Another 'gulp' and Arryn's bare belly entered the serpent's maw. Arryn looked up at the sky one last time through the bottle's glass ceiling as with another 'gulp' the snake took in her breasts and shoulders. Tears streamed down Arryn's face as she watched the roof of the bottle get replaced with the roof of the snake's mouth as its maw closed over her head with one final 'gulp'. Then a bulge that was once Arryn Zech could be seen traveling down the length of the snake.

Arryn squirmed within the tight confining tube known as the esophagus. All around her she felt the powerful muscles slowly massaging her, feet first, towards the stomach. A mixture of saliva and mucus clung to Arryn from head to toe, effectively hiding her tears. 'I can't believe I avoided getting eaten by my puppy and a cat only for a snake to get me while sleeping,' Arryn thought as she listened to the gurgles of the stomach getting closer and closer. After what seemed like an eternity the former RWBY star's journey came to an end as her bare feet made contact with the stomach sphincter. Recognizing the lovely lady as food it quickly squeezed her into the snake's stomach.

The stomach was only slightly roomier than the esophagus was, and thus Arryn was forced to remain on her back as she continued to squirm. Before long the digestive juices began to flow. Arryn's bare flesh tingled were the digestive enzymes made contact with her skin. As Arryn marinated in the digestive enzymes the walls, floor, and ceiling began kneading her all over. Fortunately, for Arryn she passed out before the end of her first day digestion so she did not have to endure the full four days of being slowly digested.
11122111221214.title: Sleep Means Digestion

11122112.content: Did Arryn find herself before a now massive squirrel?
11122112.title: Squirrel?

111221121.content: From the grass emerged a squirrel. Sitting on its hind legs the normally small rodent looked down at Arryn with curiosity. Normally she might have found it adorable, but at her size even this creature was a threat to her. However squirrels don't tend to be predatory, so maybe she could try and scare it off. However, maybe it would be better to run away just to be safe. What does Arryn choose to do?
111221121.title: The Squirrel

1112211221.content:
Arryn watched in horror as a bird emerged from the grass. She probably wouldn't have minded too much if it weren't for her reduced stature. Just looking at it the RWBY star could tell she could pretty much fit in that beak, and the way the bird was staring at her did not help. Realizing she had to get away before she became bird food Arryn turned on her heel and ran in the opposite direction. Unfortunately she only made it about two steps before she felt something large and heavy pin her to the ground.

"NO!" the former voice actress screamed as she saw herself beneath the bird's foot. Then she felt the clawed toes wrap around her as she looked up at the bird. It seemed to cock its head in confusion as if it didn't know what to make of her. Arryn tried to squirm free but a quick squeeze brought that to an end. All Arryn could do was watch in as the bird...
1112211221.title: The Bird

111222.content:
As Arryn dived towards the door she squeezed her eyes shut as she eagerly anticipated getting away from her hungry pooch. However, she soon felt herself land with a 'SPLAT' instead of a thud. Arryn's eyes snapped open, then widened in horror.

"NO!" Arryn cried out as she found herself on a slimy pink muscle. As the former RWBY star had dived for the door Watson had unfurled his tongue to catch her on it. Before she could even try to escape Watson pulled his tongue, along with Arryn, back into his maw. Arryn could only scream before her dog's jaws closed sealing her inside.

"Watson!" Arryn cried out as she laid on her dog's massive tongue. "PLEASE DON'T EAT ME!"

Unfortunately, the former voice actress's pleas fell on deaf ears as Watson began the process of tasting his former owner. Arryn felt the tongue begin to move beneath her. Soon she was being licked against the palette and rolled around on the tongue. Occasionally Watson would suck on her like a piece of candy. Evidently Arryn's dog found her to be quite tasty as saliva slowly flooded the mouth, and effectively covered the former voice actress from head to toe in the substance. Watson continued to savor Arryn's delectable flavor for about ten minutes before the tongue finally settled down. Arryn sighed in relief thinking that maybe Watson had changed his mind about eating her. Then she felt the tongue tip up and she started sliding backwards. Turning her head Arryn's eyes grew wide with horror as she saw the black abyss of her dog's throat approaching.

"NO! NO! NO! NO! NO!" Arryn cried as she desperately clawed for some kind of handhold on the tongue to stop her descent. Unfortunately, both the former RWBY star and the pink muscle beneath her were too slick with saliva for her to get a good grasp. Within a matter of seconds Arryn felt her barefeet enter the back of the throat. As soon as that happened Watson tilted his head back and with an audible 'GULP' swallowed his former owner alive and whole.

Inside the esophagus Arryn screamed and squirmed as the muscles surrounding her slowly massaged her down to the stomach. She could hear the gurgles of the belly beneath her grow closer with every second. Mucus mixed with the saliva that covered her from head to toe. Arryn's journey came to an end almost to soon as she felt her feet come into contact with a wall of flesh that was none other than the stomach sphincter. Recognizing the lovely lady as food it quickly squeezed her into the stomach, and she was in free fall for a moment before landing on a soft squishy surface with a 'PLOP'.

Quickly sitting up Arryn surveyed her fleshy prison in shock and horror. She couldn't believe her precious pooch had actually eaten her. However, the fact that he had eaten her was too strong to ignore. Getting back up on her feet Arryn quickly made her way to the stomach wall. She pounded and kicked it as she begged Watson to let her out. Meanwhile, Watson felt and heard nothing from his former owner as he made his way to her bedroom. Once there he jumped up on her bed and laid down on it before drifting off to sleep.

Inside the stomach the force of Watson's jump knocked Arryn off her feet and she fell into a small pool of digestive juices. Feeling her skin starting to tingle Arryn cried out and quickly scrambled out the pool and back onto relatively dry stomach. Panting the RWBY star turned dog food looked back at the pool and watch as it slowly grew. That was when the hard truth of her situation hit her. This was the end of Arryn Zech. She had been eaten by her dog and there was only one way she would be leaving his belly. As she realized this Arryn hugged her knees to her chest and began to sob in despair as the stomach slowly filled with acid. Soon Arryn found herself floating in nothing but digestive enzymes that caused her skin to tingle where they made contact with her bare flesh. After a few minutes though Arryn began to scream in pain as the tingling turned into a horrible burning. Being digested alive was the most agonizing thing Arryn had ever felt. About an hour later Arryn's screams finally stopped as she was reduced to nothing more then a nutritious soup that was soon sent to the intestines.

Two hours later Watson awoke from his nap feeling the need to relieve himself. So he jumped off Arryn's bed and made his way to the front door. Once there Watson used the doggy door in the door to exit the house. Going over to a bush in the corner of the front yard he quickly crouched and relieved himself of his former owner's remains. Once he was finished Watson went back into the house blissfully unaware that he had actually eaten his owner. In the end Arryn Zech wound up as nothing more than a steaming pile of dog poop in her front yard.
111222.title: A Doggy Treat

12.content: Looking around at her surroundings, Arryn, noticed she was no longer in her living room. She was now surrounded by towering blades of grass. The wind causing the grass to bend back and forth, as it wiped though her own hair, and bringing with it a particularly pungent smell. Holding her nose, Arryn decided to look for the source of the pungent Oder, unable to see over the grass she climbed a rock. Arryn gasped at what she saw once she got to the top. Looking outwards she can tell she’s in a field and large wooden posts are lined up near her. Further out in the field she sees a large pond surrounded by reeds and a few cows roaming around. On the other side of the fence Arryn notices a barn, a chicken cope, a dog house settled next to a country style farmhouse, and a few select animal pens in between the barn and house. Then it clicked she was somehow in the middle of a farm on the country side, which explained the smell, Arryn just wished her nose would adjust quickly to the smell. Some of the pens had pigs, goats, sheep, turkeys, and she could tell there where other pen behind those but her vision was blocked, and she couldn’t tell what others there are. The wind blew by again, nearly pushing her off the rock, and Arryn decided to explore a bit. Arryn climbed off the rock and decided to head over to:
12.title: A Farm

choices: A Noise Came From The Dog House
123.content:
Arryn began to make her way to the farm house. She figured it might be her best chance at getting help in returning to normal. That is if she wasn't accidentally stepped on or if the dog that no doubt lived in the dog house found and ate her. However, there was always those possibilities.

Thankfully Arryn's trip to the farm house wasn't to eventful, and after about an hour of walking arrived. She emerged from the grass and stopped dead in her tracks. Her breath caught in her lungs as she stared up at the farm house in awe. Arryn's new height came crashing down on her once more. The farm house was only two stories high, but to Arryn it might as well have been a skyscraper. The same could be said for the dog house just a few feet next to it. Arryn curled and and uncurled her toes nervously as she looked up at the now massive structure. With a quick glance he noticed some steps that led up to the front porch.

"If I can scale those I might be able to get inside," Arryn said to herself. Taking a deep breath to steel herself Arryn began to make her way to the porch steps when...
123.title: The farm house.

1232.content:
Arryn had barely taken more than two steps when she heard a loud 'BARK'. She instantly stopped and turned to face the dog house that the noise came from. The minuscule voice actress's eyes widened in terror as she saw a border collie, now gigantic to her, emerge from the dog house. Normally Arryn would be more than happy to see a cute canine, but the sight of one more large enough to swallow her had the young woman frozen in fear. The border collie quickly sniffed the air, and looked in her direction.

'It must be able to smell me,' Arryn thought as the dog began making its way over to her. As the dog came closer she squeezed her eyes shut not wishing to see her end, but it did not come. Slowly she opened her eyes, and nearly had a heart attack as she found the massive dog peering down at her. The border collie took a few quick sniffs of the tiny woman, nearly sucking her up its nose. The border collie then brought its head back up and stared at the tiny woman.

The dog was perplexed by Arryn. She clearly looked and smelled like a human, but she was much smaller than most humans it had seen. Was she perhaps some kind of special treat from its master? The dog had to admit that the tiny human before it did look and smell tasty, but how did she taste? So the border collie lowered its head, opened its maw, and rolled out its tongue. The large pink muscle slammed into Arryn and licked her from her feet to her head, and slightly lifting her into the air. Now the tiny voice actress found herself covered in saliva.

As she tried to wipe the saliva off of herself Arryn looked up at the dog once more. The border collie licked its lips and let out a loud bark. Despite the ominous signs Arryn desperately hoped that it was just being friendly. However, the real question was did the border collie find her tasty enough to eat?
1232.title: The Dog Cometh

12321.content:
With the way the border collie was looking at her, and with how much greed the next lick came Arryn knew she was on the menu. With a scream the former voice actress turned around and tried to make a run for it. Unfortunately, at her size she couldn't get very far before things went dark and she felt the massive dog's lips seal around her waist. As the border collie lifted its head back into the air Arryn's dangling legs could be seen kicking the air as she struggled to escape. Then without ceremony the dog slurped her legs into its mouth like a pair of noodles.

Inside the maw, Arryn found herself laying on the gargantuan dog's tongue as she became covered from head to toe in saliva. Then the tongue began to roll the RWBY star turned dog food around the mouth and rub her against the pallet.From time to time the dog would even suck on her. All this plus the amount of saliva in the mouth was enough to let Arryn know that this particular canine found her to be quite tasty. She was somewhat flattered and truth be told she might even have enjoyed it if she wasn't about to be eaten. After about ten minutes of tasting and savoring her, the tongue settled down and Arryn found herself on her stomach facing the black abyss she would soon be traveling down. Then the tongue started pushing the lovely lady towards the throat and she screamed once more. Outside the border collie tilted its head back and with a loud 'GULP' a bulge that was once Arryn Zech could be seen traveling down its neck.

Inside the esophagus Arryn found herself slowly being massaged down to what she assumed was a stomach full of acid. A mixture of saliva and mucus clung to her from head to toe as the gurgles of the stomach grew ever closer. Arryn squirmed in the fleshy tube in a vain attempt to maybe make the dog that just ate her spite back up, but all she succeeded in doing was hastening her journey to a slow demise of digestion. All too soon the former voice actress's journey came to end as she came to a halt in front a wall of flesh that was none other than the stomach sphincter. Recognizing the young woman as food it quickly opened up and Arryn screamed as she found herself in free fall. She soon landed with a splat on an island of mushy dog food that had been eaten earlier that day.

Quickly getting to her feet Arryn quickly surveyed the fleshy chamber that was now her home. Her small island was the only one in a lake of digestive juices. And it was slowly disappearing as the stomach acids slowly dissolved it and soon it would be her turn.

"I'm doomed," Arryn said falling to her knees. She began to weep as her situation truly hit her. No longer was she a promising voice actress with a bright future, she wasn't even a human being now. Now all Arryn was was dog food like her slowly disappearing safe haven. Fortunately, for her though Arryn Zech passed out from the lack of oxygen just before ended up floating in the digestive enzymes, thus sparing her the agony of feeling herself be slowly digested alive.
12321.title: From Cat Girl to Dog Food

124.content:
Arryn looked around the farm and decided to go to the animal pens. If the farmers or any person is around then they might just be over there attending to the needs of the animals. Walking thought the tall grass gave her the feeling of being in a jungle or a new world. Though to Arryn it is a new world, since at an inch tall, her prospective is now altered. What would have taken her a few minutes took her a few hours with rest stops to reach the pens. It’s around dinner time now and Arryn is no closer to answers then at the start.


“Bang!” A pound slamming sound is heard from the pens area. Seeing as they are sectioned off in 3 rows Arryn decided to see what the sound was first. Hearing the bang again she decided to go down...

Move on to the next pen

Arryn also could hear what sounded like running water in the distance ahead of her. She could try locating the source and following it out of the forrest, but who knew what the water might attract. Another option Arryn had was to try and take her chances exploring the forrest, despite the risk that she might become a tasty meal. Arryn stood there for a whole minute contemplating what she should do when suddenly...

The deer is trying to bring Arryn somewhere

writing on Phone so dont murder me on grammar.

A pair of antlers shown from the brush. And it took four thundering steps towards her. The beast sniffed the air and caught the smell of her. His massive head cautiously drifted down to her.
The buck let out a snort and lifted his antlers almost poking a hole in her head. Arryn jumped backwards causing the deer to also jump winched caused the ground to shake violently.

Arryns buck loses and she dies

An egal swoops down attacking the deer and snatched Arryn

Sorry in advanced.


The weight of the other deer took her by suprise and knocked her off into the tall grass. She gets up from a great fall but had broken some bones. The two bucks where going at it. The ground was shaking so much her vision couldn't focus.

"A zoo?!" Arryn said in disbelieve. "This is one the most likely places for someone as tiny as me to be eaten!"

Not wanting to find herself on the menu Arryn turned on her heel and quickly ran for the zoo entrance. However, once she got there she found it so locked up for the night that she couldn't squeeze through at her size. Arryn looked up at the now intimidating entrance and sighed in despair. She sat down and hugged her knees to her chest wondering what she was going to do. Then, an idea came to her. Maybe Arryn should explore the zoo and visit some of the animals. She knew it was a stupid idea as it was the most likely why she wind up in an animal's gut. She wasn't even sure why she was even considering it. Maybe whatever force had shrunk her was also influencing Arryn somehow to ensure wound up on a hungry predator's menu. Arryn had no guarantee of that though; just like she had no guarantee that any of the animals would actually try to eat her at this time of night. With a sigh of defeat Arryn got back onto her feet, and decided to go through with the idea. Who knew, maybe she would find a way to return to her normal size in the process.

The tiny voice actress looked at the paths that lay before her. One led to the primates. Another led to just general mammal exhibits. The next one led to the aviary where the birds were kept. Yet another led to the reptile house. The final path led to the aquatics area. Arryn ponder over which path to take. Each one had its risks and possible rewards. Eventually, Arryn decided to pay a visit to...

141.content:
With out ceremony Arryn made her way to the primate enclosures. At her small size it took nearly an hour to get there, but she soon found herself at the first exhibit. It was a large cage full of tropical plant life. Looking up Arryn saw a sign at the top that read Gorilla.

"I guess I'm at the gorilla habitat," Arryn said in wonder. Even the smallest plant in there dwarfed her. But where were the inhabitants? Arryn couldn't see any sign of the gorillas, but that could be because of how dark it was. Would be wise for her to just walk on in though? After all she could end up under foot or worse digesting in a belly. Maybe the young voice actress should move on. Arryn stood there contemplating on what to do when she finally decided to...

1411.content:
"Well gorillas aren't predators," Arryn said to herself, "What harm could it do to enter their habitat?"

With that the young voice actress walked on into the cage. As she made her way through the dense vegetation she felt as though she were exploring some alien world. Of course from her reduced stature it practically was an alien world. However, as Arryn marveled at her surroundings she failed to notice that she was being watched. All of the sudden a large furry hand grabbed the poor girl and began to lift her up.

"So this is what it's like to be in King Kong," Arryn muttered as she struggled in the grasp that held her.

Soon the voice actress found herself in front of the gorilla's face. She ceased her struggling out of sheer awe at the sight. Then the gorilla opened its hand Arryn found herself sitting in the palm of the primate's hand. The gorilla leaned its face in closer and Arryn felt herself being pulled towards its nostrils as it inhaled, and being pushed back when it exhaled. As the gorilla continued to sniff her a chill ran down the RWBY star's spine as she remembered something. While not predators apes such as gorillas did have a tendency to eat bugs. SHE WAS BUG SIZED! After a few minutes the gorilla stopped sniffing and pulled its face back. Arryn trembled as she sat in the gorilla's palm watching a smile appear on its face. What was the gorilla going to do to her?
1411.title: Night of the Gorilla

Arryn exhaled a sigh of relieve when the gorilla started lowering her. She was just happy the gorilla didn't seem to want to eat her.

The tiny woman soon found out when the gorilla's hand stopped at its crotch. It was then that Arryn discovered the gorilla was male. Standing up she looked at the ape's member and then up at the gorilla's face. He looked down at her expectantly. 'Does he expect me to pleasure him?' Arryn wondered. She started to back away but one quick snarl from the great ape was enough to stop her. It seemed that if Arryn do as the gorilla said the consequences would be dire. Does she agree or does she refuse and risk it?

Arryn can’t see anything, but guesses the gorilla is the one who snagged her, as she is tossed around in its fist as it moves away from the front of the cage.

After a few moments Arryn is blinded by a bright light as the fist opens. Looking around she sees cement walls and some hay in the corner. This must be the inner enclosure where the gorilla sleeps and eats. A gust is air gains her attention and she turns to face the gorilla who is holding her. All she sees is a wall of black leathery skin with 2 holes in it. Suddenly she feels a pulling sensation as as the holes widen and she is dragging across them palm to wards the holes, till the holes narrow, then she is pushed back by a big gust or wind back against the fingers. This happens a few more times and the wall moves back further to reveal the gorilla’s face and that he had been smelling her.

Arryn’s heart speeds up as the gorilla’s eyes lock onto her and seem to study her. His breath rolls over her as he opens is mouth like a grin. Two finger from his free hand grab her and lift her in the air above the gorilla’s head. Arryn struggles when the gorilla tilts its head back and opens its mouth. Arryn didn’t get to see much as the gorilla let go and she fell into its mouth. She landed on the tongue and the saliva gave no way for her to grab onto anything as she slid to wards the throat. Arryn grasped at the slimy surface, but couldn’t find a hand hold. As soon as her feet reached the end, the gorilla closed its mouth, and swallow with an audible “Gulp!” Arryn was pushed down the throat by the tight muscles. After a free fall she landed in the stomach, a tingling sensation on her skin started to burn. She luckily past from the pain before the real digestion began.

"Okay," Arryn said to herself nervously, "If I'm going to do this I should probably find the laziest animal I can to join."

Looking at the various rows Arryn decided to start her search on...

Resting in the pool was a snake that would be considered big even if she was normal sized, but it was massive to her now. Would Arryn join the snake in its tank?

144111.content:
Arryn felt the cold water envelope her as she landed in the pool. Quickly swimming upwards the former RWBY star broke through the surface and gasped for air as she splashed around for a moment as she tried to regain her bearings. Once she caught her breathe she looked around as she tread water trying to look for the anaconda. Arryn could not see any sign of the massive snake, but seeing as she hadn't seen it leave the pool before she jumped in she figured she should leave the pull before she found herself swimming in digestive juices. Thus Arryn began to swim towards the shore, but sadly she didn't make it very far.

The anaconda had noticed a small but tasty looking creature land in its pool. As the meal tried to swim for it the snake re positioned itself under the water and rose to the surface with a open maw. As Arryn swam she didn't notice what was happening in front of her. She only noticed something was wrong she felt her upper half became beached onto a slimy surface. Confused the minuscule voice actress looked around and her eyes widened in horror as she realized what was happening. She started to scream only to be cut off by the snakes jaws closing around her waist.

With its prey secured the anaconda lifted its head completely out of the water, and Arryn's dangling legs could be seen kicking the air as she tried to escape her consumption. With a quick 'GULP' the hungry serpent swallowed her up to her ankles. The lovely lady could only moan and wiggle her barefeet and toes as her head and shoulders entered the anaconda's gullet. Then with another 'GULP' the anaconda swallowed her completely.

Inside the esophagus Arryn found herself being slowly massaged down by the powerful muscles towards the stomach. A mixture of saliva and mucus covered her from head to toe. After nearly five minutes of travelling down the long esophagus the former voice actress came to the stomach sphincter. Recognizing her as food it quickly opened up and squeezed her into the belly. Thanks to the anaconda's size Arryn found herself able to stand up in the fleshy chamber. She was surprised that she was able to see as well as she could in the stomach despite there being no light source. She saw digestive enzymes dripping down the walls and ceiling. Panicking Arryn ran across the spongy flesh as the digestive enzymes slowly covered her to a wall and began pounding on it.

"LET ME OUT! PLEASE!" Arryn begged as she kicked and punched at the stomach wall to no effect. She felt her skin slowly began to tingle as she began to experience the wonderful process of digestion. The poor girl spent an entire week and a half in the stomach as she was slowly turned into a nutritious stew. Arryn Zech was only granted a reprieve from the pain of digestion when the digestive enzymes reached her heart on the second to last day.
144111.title: Into the Snake's Gullet

One she could wait by the check out counter for someone to find her in the morning, or two she could find an animal to join for the night, assuming it didn't end with her being eaten. After about five minutes of patting Arryn seemed to have patted a spot that seemed to cause the chameleon to open its mouth. "I don't feel like becoming lizard food," Arryn said and turned away from the chameleon.

However, Arryn did find the idea of playing with a dog at her new size rather tempting. Did she join the malamute in its cage?

Being a natural mimic the parrot might be able to help her gain the attention of some employee when morning came. Does Arryn risk the climb?
151122.title: Pretty Parrot?

1511221.content:
Deciding the parrot would be her best bet to get noticed in the morning Arryn decided to climb up to the bird cage. Fortunately, for her there was a broom leaning next to it. Climbing the broom wasn't easy and Arryn fell a few times, but not hard or far enough to kill her, just make her sore in the morning. After about ten minutes the RWBY star made it to her destination, and collapsed on the floor of the cage as she took a moment to catch her breath.

When she was finally rested, Arryn got back onto her feet and looked up at the parrot. She gulped at the sight of it looking down at her, and the metal floor of the cage seemed to grow colder beneath her barefeet. Now that she was up close to it the parrot was a tad bit more intimidating then she initially thought. However, she came into the cage with one goal. Arryn took a deep breathe and curled and uncurled her toes. Then she began pacing back and forth as she tried to come up with the best phrase to get the parrot to say to draw an employee's attention. After a minute of pacing the young lady came up with three words.

"Give me food," Arryn said to the parrot. 'Give me food' ended up being a phrase she would have to repeat multiple times. After about ten minutes the voice actress got her desired result. Satisfied, Arryn smiled and decided to reward the parrot with a treat. Looking to the food tray on the cage wall, she climbed up to it and leaned in over the edge to get the parrot something good to eat.

"Huh, almost empt.. WHOA!" Arryn cried out as she leaned to far and fell into the tray.

Arryn quickly sat up and looked out to the top. The tray was too deep for her to be able to climb out without help. However, that was the least of Arryn's concerns at the moment. The parrot was looking down at her once again, but this time in a different way as it cocked its head to the side.

"Give me food," the parrot said, and Arryn's eyes grew wide with horror as she realized what was about to happen.

"No, please not like this!" the voice actress turned bird food begged as the parrot's open beak descended upon her. In less than a minute the parrot lifted its head up and the lovely lady's tiny legs could be seen kicking outside its beak.This did not last long though as with a 'GULP' and click of the beak Arryn was brought entirely inside. The parrot's tongue tasted her only long enough to determine if she tasted good enough to eat. Upon finding that Arryn did taste good the parrot tilted its head back and with a loud 'GULP' swallowed her whole and alive.

The journey from tray to beak to gullet was so fast Arryn barely put up a struggle before she found herself being massaged down to her doom. Saliva and mucus covered her from head to toe. Then Arryn screamed as she found herself being squeezed into the bird's crop. Sitting up the former RWBY star looked around the fleshy chamber in horror.

"PLEASE NOT LIKE THIS!" Arryn cried out as she struggled not ready to die just yet. She cried out that phrase and multiple variations of it the whole time before the crop begin to chew her up to make her easier to digest.

When morning came all that remained of Arryn Zech was a white smudge at the bottom of the parrot's cage, and one phrase the parrot repeated over and over.

"No, please not like this!"
1511221.title: Polly Want An Arryn Zech?

While Parrot might help someone notice her, Arryn decided that sharing a cage with one the entire night could get annoying so she decided to move on. Arryn's next animal encounter was of the aquatic variety. There was a large fish tank in front of her filled with all kinds of fish.

"If I go for a swim in there I most likely won't becoming out," Arryn said to herself. But what if there was no hope of her returning to normal. Hell, even if one of the employees found her there was no guarantee that they wouldn't just crush her or feed her to one of the animals. Maybe Arryn should go for a swim and risk becoming fish food just to get it over with. Does Arryn go for a swim?

15112221.content:
"Time for ya ta sleep with the fishes," Arryn told herself in her best mobster voice. Though technically she was going to FEED the fishes. Wiping a single tear from her face the former RWBY star began to make her way to the top of the tank. In less than a minute Arryn found herself standing on the wet edge of the tank. She gulped and curled her toes nervously as she looked down at the all the fish in the water she was about to feed herself to.

"You're not ending your life Arryn, you're living out your fantasy of being a mermaid," Arryn said to herself as she closed her eyes working up her nerves. "A mermaid that is at the bottom of the food chain. She hoped the swarm of fish would eat her as quickly and painlessly as possible. So taking a deep breathe and holding it the lovely lady swan dived into the fish tank.

Almost immediately Arryn was swarmed by a large group of fish wishing to investigate their visitor only for the largest one to grab her by her head and drag her down to the bottom of the tank. With a quick 'GULP' the fish took in her torso as her legs kicked in the water. Then with another quick 'GULP' and only Arryn's barefeet and toes could be seen wiggling in the water. With one final 'GULP' the fish completely swallowed her whole and alive before any of the other fish could get a taste of the human who had feed herself to them.

Inside the esophagus Arryn was painfully squeezed into the stomach. Sitting up the young woman looked around the slimy, fleshy chamber in horror. Arryn had expected to be torn apart and devoured by multiple fish so quickly she would be dead before she felt anything. She didn't want a slow demise digestion. That was arguably worse. As the general sliminess of the belly began to cover her the voice actress turned fish food curled up into a ball. As her skin began to tingle Arryn Zech cried herself into a sleep from which she would not awaken.
15112221.title: Arryn Zech Feeds the Fishes

choices: Accidentally Steps Onto the Feeding Mechanism
Moves on to the Next Animal
15112222.content:
Arryn quickly shook her head to get those thoughts out of her head. She couldn't give up just yet, so she moved on. Upon coming to the next enclosure Arryn's breathe caught in her throat out of surprise. Before her was a glass tank with an open top, and inside that tank was a baby ALLIGATOR!

"Is... is that ev...even legal?" Arryn stammered as the gator stared at her through the glass. Regardless of the legality of it, there was no way Arryn was going to willingly set foot in that tank. If she did the gator would no doubt eat her. So Arryn took a few steps back when she...
15112222.title: A GATOR?! Is That Even Legal?

151122221.content:
Before Arryn knew it she felt cold metal beneath her feet. Then there was a click and the voice actress found herself being hurled through the air. Apparently the pet store employees didn't feel like feeding the gator by hand so they had rigged up a catapult for feeding it. And Arryn had just triggered it. She screamed before landing in the tank with an 'oof'.

Arryn looked up and saw the gator coming for her with a wide open maw. Scrambling to her feet she ran for her life as the hungry reptile gave chase. As she ran she threw tiny pebbles at the gator only for it to swallow them. She threw some moss only for the gator to shake it out of its maw. Then Arryn threw a piece of meat for the gator to gulp it down. It seemed gator wasn't going to be full until it stomached Arryn. So the young woman ran around the tank.

Eventually, Arryn had to stop and catch her breathe. This was the gator's chance, and a quick whip of its tail it knocked the young woman off her feet. Then with a quick snap of its jaws, it took in her legs up to her knees.

"NO!" Arryn cried out as with a quick 'GULP' the gator brought her in up to her waist. The former RWBY star grabbed another pebble and tried to hit the animal that was eating her with it as she felt her feet enter its throat. Unfortunately, Arryn was not in position to make a decent strike on the beast. Then the lovely lady dropped the pebble and screamed as with another 'GULP' the only parts of her that remained in the outside world were her fore arms. Knowing there was nothing she could do now she merely waved her hands goodbye to the outside world before with one final 'GULP' she was completely swallowed alive and whole.

Inside the esophagus Arryn found herself being slowly massaged feet first down to her slow demise of digestion. A mixture of saliva and mucus covered her from head to toe. Before long though Arryn's journey came to an end as she felt her feet come into contact with the stomach sphincter. Slowly it squeezed her into the stomach feet first, and the former voice actress landed in the fleshy chamber with a splash. Floating in the digestive juices she cried out as she felt her skin painfully began to tingle. Sadly the only thing that could hear Arryn Zech's cries was the very animal that had consumed her as she was slowly digested alive.
151122221.title: Gator Food

choices: Nope, Into the Cage She Goes
1512.content:
"Well I might as well go right," Arryn said to herself after deciding to go down one of the aisles.

With that the tiny woman made her way down the right aisle. The first cage Arryn came to contained a calico kitten. 'Who would cage such a cute little creature,' Arryn thought, feeling a bit of kinship with it. The calico kitten looked at Arryn as if expecting her to join it. Question was could the former RWBY star resist its cuteness?
1512.title: Cute Little Kitten?

15121.content:
If Arryn were an anime character her eyes would have gotten large and watery at the sheer cuteness of the calico kitten. Without any hesitation the tiny voice actress walked between the bars into the cage. What transpired next were the cutest ten minutes of Arryn's life. She would rub the kitten's belly, roll a ball of yarn around while the kitten swatted at it, and run around the cage while the feline play pounced on her. Arryn laughed and smiled the whole time, but eventually she grew tired. With a yawn the former voice actress laid down on the floor of the cage and went to sleep.

When Arryn woke up she found herself in a dark, moist, and squishy chamber. She was sitting up to her breasts in a mysterious liquid that caused her skin to tingle. With horror the former voice actress slowly realized where she was and what had happened. It seems the young calico thought Arryn had been playing dead, and instead of letting her go to waste, ate her. Arryn screamed and started pounding and kicking the stomach walls in a desperate hope to get the kitten to vomit her back out. Unfortunately, the only response the young woman got was the feline purring, causing both her and her environment to start shaking as she was slowly digested alive.

Meanwhile on the outside, the calico kitten laid down for its own cat nap. As it drifted off to sleep it couldn't help but wonder if all of its toys were as tasty as Arryn Zech had been.
15121.title: Arryn Zech, Calico Kitty, and the Cat Gut

15122.content:
While the kitten was cute Arryn knew that cats tend to be carnivores. If she were to go in there it was possible she would end up as a pile of poop in the kitten's litter box. With effort Arryn manged to pull herself away from the kitten, and head on to the next enclosure.

Next in the line up was a glass cage and Arryn gasped when she saw its inhabitant. Inside was syrian hamster, and the normally small mammal was now six times the voice actress's size. It stared at her and Arryn begin to consider her options. Hamsters were generally cute and not aggressive towards humans. She looked up and saw that there were holes near the top that were big enough for her to fit through. Does Arryn decide to join the hamster?
15122.title: An Adorable Hamster?

151221.content:
"Well it's just a hamster, what harm could it do?" Arryn said, and with that she began her climb. It wasn't easy climbing up the glass and she fell a few times, but after about ten minutes Arryn finally reached one of the holes in the top. She hung from it with both her hands, took a deep breathe, and with a little effort hoisted herself up and through the hole.

As Arryn fell into the cage the first thing she noticed was the smell. She wrinkled her nose and gaged before she landed on the ground with an 'oof'.

"Who knew hamsters could be so smelly," Arryn said as she sat up. Suddenly, a shadow fell over her and she looked up to see the syrian hamster towering over her. The way it starred at her was a bit unnerving. Then Arryn took a good look at her surroundings and saw that she was surrounded by seeds in a blue, plastic bowel. A food bowel. Putting two and two together the hamster grabbed Arryn with its front paws before she could make four, and stuffed as much of the former voice actress as it could into its mouth.

Inside the maw, Arryn found herself being tasted by the hamster's tongue. She squirmed as the saliva quickly covered her. Apparently, Arryn must have been quite tasty since the hamster didn't seem to be in a rush to finish eating her. Outside the maw all the lovely lady could do was wiggle her barefeet and toes as they were the only parts of her not in the hamster's mouth. After about five minutes the hamster's tongue slipped out and started licking Arryn's toes and the soles of her feet. The former voice actress squeaked in surprise and wiggle her feet and toes harder in response. After about three minutes of tasting Arryn's feet the hamster's tongue wrapped around them and pulled them into the maw. This forced the young woman's head into the throat, and out of reflex the hamster swallowed her whole and alive.

Inside the esophagus Arryn was at a loss for words as the muscles rippled all around her. She couldn't believe that of all the threats in this world it was being eaten by a hamster that did her in. A mixture of saliva and mucus covered her from head to toe as she was slowly massaged down to her slow demise of digestion. Unfortunately, Arryn's journey wasn't a long one as she was soon squeezed into the belly of the beast. Sitting up in the fleshy chamber the RWBY star turned food noticed that it was rather warm and smelly inside the belly, and that she was slowly being coated in digestive juices that made her skin tingle. Not willing to die just yet, Arryn kicked and punched at the stomach walls in a vain attempt to escape, but the heat in the belly quickly drained her of her energy.

"And I thought they smelled bad on the outside," Arryn said, so her last words would be a Star Wars quote, just before she passed out from the heat and exhaustion, never to awaken again.
151221.title: Cute Hamster, Not So Cute Inside

1513.content:
"Well I'd rather not get eaten," Arryn said to herself "So I'll just wait by the check out counter."

So Arryn made her way to the check out counter. It was tall and imposing, but it was the tiny voice actress's best hope for getting help in the morning. While she was there though she might as well get some sleep, good thing she was more or less dressed for bed. So the RWBY star laid down on the floor and shut her eyes as she drifted off to sleep. After a few hours Arryn was awoken as something was...
1513.title: Sleep Over in the Pet Store

15132.content: What was licking Arryn Zech?
15132.title: Licking Her

151321.content:
Arryn's sleep was peaceful a slimy sensation moved across her body. She moaned for a moment when the sensation moved across her a second time. This time she awoke with a start to only to see a massive tongue licking her from her feet to her head.

"GAH!" Arryn cried out as she quickly sat up and quickly crawled backwards.

Looking up Arryn saw she had been licked by a now massive corgi that was staring at the tiny woman in a rather unsettling way. The former RWBY star could guess why it had been licking her, but maybe it had recognized her as human. Perhaps she could reason with it.

"H..h...hey t...th..there boy," Arryn stammered in fear. "Is i...it okay if I call y...you Zwei?"

The corgi merely barked in response.

"I'll t...ta...take that as a yes," Arryn said, "Now y..you don't a...ac...actually want to eat me do you?"

Zwei barked once more and licked his lips as he stared at the frightened young woman before him with an unmistakable look.

"Oh," Arryn gulped, "I guess you do."

With that Arryn quickly got onto her feet and...
151321.title: Arryn Zech vs Zwei

choices: Find a place for cover and form a plan
154.content: Climbing what looks like a rotted log, Arryn takes a better view of her surroundings. The ground was muddy, a huge expanse of water like the ocean with green masses floating in it, grasses and reeds mixed with cat tails soared over her head, trees grew into the sky that was barely visible though the connecting branches and foliage, but what was really noticeable was the smell. "A Swamp! Of all the places too end up, I land here?! I better explore my area and find cover before any animals find me."
154.title: A Swamp

1543.content: Climbing down the log was harder, due to the deterioration, as pieces where falling off as soon as her weight was applied to it. Finally after a few minutes, Arryn reached the ground again, and leaned against the log to catch her breath. Taking a few steps in a random direction to find shelter to hold up in, a shadow blocks the sun from above, Arryn quickly turned to see what it was.
1543.title: A shadow looms over her

15431.content: An animal but what kind?
15431.title: An animal

154311.content: Does Arryn face a frog or a toad?
154311.title: Frog or Toad?

choices: A Hungry Heron Snatches Up The Frog
1543111.content: As the shadow fell upon Arryn, she turned around and looked up at the log she had just climbed down. What she saw filled her with fear. There sitting atop the log was a massive frog. Just looking at it Arryn could tell it was more than capable of swallowing her alive. Then the frog lept to the ground no more than 20 ft in front of Arryn. As panic began to rise in her, Arryn remembered reading once that some frogs' vision is based on movement. Maybe if she stood perfectly still this frog wouldn't see her and she wouldn't become its next meal. So Arryn stood as still as she could while the frog looked in her direction. As her heart pounded in her chest Arryn wondered if standing still would work. Does it?
1543111.title: Monstrous Frog

15431111.content:
As her heart pounded in her chest Arryn wondered how long she would have to wait to find out if her plan would work. Turns out she didn't have long to wait. The frog hadn't been staring in her direction for more then a minute when the amphibian opened its mouth and shot its tongue out at the tiny voice actress.

"NO!" Arryn cried out as the long sticky appendage wrapped around her arms and torso. Then the frog used its tongue to slowly pull the young woman towards its hungry maw. Arryn squirmed and dug her heels into the muddy ground in a futile attempt to save herself, but she still moved closer and closer to her doom. As she continued to be pulled towards the maw she wondered why the frog didn't just eat her and get it over with. Then with another squirm Arryn's eyes widened in horror as the look on the frog's face told her the truth. She was delicious and the frog was going to savor her as much as possible.

"So you like how I taste huh?" Arryn said as she squirmed once more to provide the frog another blast of flavor. "Then enjoy me while you can, because I won't be eaten easily!"

All too soon she found herself in front of the frog's hungry maw. The former voice actress could only let out a yelp as the slimy lips sealed around her waist. The frog lifted its head back up and Arryn's dangling legs could be seen kicking the air as she continued to struggle against her fate. Inside the maw the tongue unwrapped itself from the former voice actress and began to lick her all over, thus covering her in the frog's sticky saliva. Despite her claim the frog was eating the poor girl rather easily as with a quick 'gulp' the lips resealed around her knees. Arryn kicked her legs harder in response as the tongue continued to assault her. Some saliva entered her mouth and she quickly spat it out.

"This is just like my dream," Arryn moaned in despair. With another 'gulp' the frog's lips sealed around her ankles, thus leaving only her barefeet visible to the outside world. Now all Arryn could do to struggle is wiggle her feet and toes. The poor girl now found her head inches from the throat that led to her slow demise of digestion. Soon the frog's tongue slipped out of its mouth and licked each of the former voice actress's toes and the soles of her feet. Arryn squeaked and wiggled her feet and toes harder in response. Unfortunately, with one last mighty 'GULP' Arryn felt her heels, soles, and finally toes squeeze past the amphibian's slimy lips as the frog swallowed her whole and alive.

When she first entered the esophagus Arryn had screamed, but now she only silently wept. She became covered from head to toe in a mixture of saliva and mucus as the muscles slowly massaged her to the stomach below. All to soon though Arryn came to a wall of flesh that was none other than the stomach sphincter. Recognizing the lovely lady as food it opened up and squeezed her into the stomach. The fleshy chamber while less constricting than the esophagus was still cramped enough to keep Arryn laying on her belly. Though she couldn't move much any way as she was covered in the frog's sticky saliva. Soon the digestive juices began to flow and Arryn once again wept. Her skin tingled from where the digestive enzymes met her bare flesh as she lay marinating in them. As the digestive juices continued to flow though Arryn soon found it impossible to keep enough of her above the fluids and they soon rushed into her lungs, thus quickly drowning her. While it wasn't the most pleasant way to die it did at least spare Arryn the agony of feeling herself being slowly digested alive.
15431111.title: Arryn Zech is Frog Food

15431113.content:
As Arryn stood there wondering if she was about to become frog food, something unexpected happened. The frog's eyes seemed to grow wide, before it turned around and hopped into the water. Arryn was stunted for a moment, before a smile spread across her face.

"Yeah you better run," the young woman laughed. Unfortunately, her sense of confidence and relief soon faded as another shadow loomed over her. Arryn gulped and slowly turned around. Looking up in terror the miniature voice actress found a hungry heron towering over her and looking straight at her. No doubt the heron had planned on eating the frog, but now Arryn was the only one there. However, did the heron really what to eat her now? Arryn didn't know and she wasn't sure she wanted to find out. In the end Arryn just...
15431113.title: From Bad to Worse

154313.content: Other choices of swamp animals:
154313.title: Other animal

155.content: More choices for Arryn Zech to be:
155.title: Yet Somewhere Else

1553.content: More choices Arryn Zech could be at:
1553.title: Somewhere else

info.brief_description: She's shrunk and has to try and survive the various animals that want to eat her.
info.description:
Arryn Zech (of RWBY fame) was just relaxing in her home when she drifted off to sleep. When she woke up she was horrified to not only find herself only 1 inch tall, but that every animal in the area is hungry and she is on the menu. Will Arryn survive, or end up in a stomach.

Arryn Zech as she appears in this story: https://pics.wikifeet.com/Arryn-Zech-Feet-3194356.jpg

Rules:
1.) Arryn can't grow or shrink any more.
2.) No nudity.
3.) SOFT VORE ONLY!
4.)Arryn isn't immune to digestion.
5.)Be descriptive.
6.) HAVE FUN!
info.pretty_title: Arryn Zech vs. The Giant Hungry Animals
